title: Group Therapy: How do I tell them they can't bring their dogs?
description: A listener has a problem in her friend group.  Basically half of them bring their dogs everywhere they go and she's sick of it.  How does she tell them they can't always bring their dogs?
itunes:summary: A listener has a problem in her friend group.  Basically half of them bring their dogs everywhere they go and she's sick of it.  How does she tell them they can't always bring their dogs?
